title: [Dancing Dahcre, Hallway]
description: Stained glaes windows, ranging in color from pale blue to a deep navy occupy the outside walls at this turn in the hall.  The windows admit a minimal amount of sunlight that washes coldly over the white walls and silver-veined cream marble floor.  Carefully cultivated iceblossoms reside in several glaesine pots in the corner and to either side of the silver arch.
